This text block has the HTML ID test1

When entering the URL of this page into your browser's address bar, and appending the hash #test1 — the browser should smooth-scroll to this element. When clicking the link at the beginning of this page, the browser should also smooth-scroll to this text block.

  • First tab

  • Last Tab

When the browser smooth-scrolls to anchor #test2 the middle tab of this tabs element should be opened after scrolling to this tabs block.
